title: When your team says you fed mid but you only died twice and they have 16 kils

replies.body:
When a laner says "Report jungler. Never ganks and feeds lanes"

#HOW DOES HE FEED IF HE NEVER GANKS
[Hmmmmmmm](https://media1.tenor.com/images/37766d23c4c902aa19b44d39f120377e/tenor.gif)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Sparkle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=00030005,timestamp=2017-12-14T22:40:46.096+0000)
>
> [Hmmmmmmm](https://media1.tenor.com/images/37766d23c4c902aa19b44d39f120377e/tenor.gif)

sparkle, do u have an actual job at risotto games or do you just meme all day xD
https://i.imgur.com/jNoqiVr.gif
Risotto Games sounds like a company that would make only rice cooking games.
Risotto Games made me laugh - never heard that one before. Also risottos are really annoying to make but they're the recipe I pull out to impress people >_>

I use it Risotto Games all the time but get unappreciated.
Shit like this makes me wanna start large revolution and turn Galactic Republic into Galactic Empire.
Static Shiv Palpatine did nothing wrong!!!
Memeing *is* her job

HOLY MOLY GUACAMOLI This is a real honor, the first time a rioter comments on my comment!!

WOOHOOOO LEGGO

https://media.giphy.com/media/l41Ye5dhLPqILtT2w/giphy.gif
He fed baron... DUh
and dragon
In Soviet Freljord, lanes gank you.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=00030006,timestamp=2017-12-14T23:23:51.380+0000)
>
> In Soviet Freljord, lanes gank you.

End trouble maker tos eez behst ghem~ {{champion:201}}

Maybe he tries some fancy solo plays that naturally fail.
Everything is possible If your mind is open enough...
Open like your mid in such games...

IT LOOKS SOMETHING LIKE THIS:

you die twice to {{champion:91}} . talon then roams bot twice, and their team kills your bot lane and jungle both times. meanwhile in mid lane, you havn't pushed out your lane or followed. top lane traded 1 for 1 with his laner twice. their ADC {{champion:119}} then gets a double kill on your bot lane because he is playing Draven and has a lead. 5-10 minutes later, your team loses the first team fight because their bot, jungle and talon are super far ahead of your team. You survived because you played far back. 

YOU FED MID

Does that geometry add up to you now?

Bot lane has wards bro. 

Follow Talon -> get deleted anyway.
_Talon jumps gracefully over walls avoiding typical warding areas_

> [{quoted}](name=The Real A Twice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-12-14T05:00:11.813+0000)
>
> IT LOOKS SOMETHING LIKE THIS:
> 
> you die twice to {{champion:91}} . talon then roams bot twice, and their team kills your bot lane and jungle both times. meanwhile in mid lane, you havn't pushed out your lane or followed. top lane traded 1 for 1 with his laner twice. their ADC {{champion:119}} then gets a double kill on your bot lane because he is playing Draven and has a lead. 5-10 minutes later, your team loses the first team fight because their bot, jungle and talon are super far ahead of your team. You survived because you played far back. 
> 
> YOU FED MID
> 
> Does that geometry add up to you now?

Cool hypothetical story, bro.

Mid laner gives FB, enemy mid laner roams 24/7 making plays while our midlaner farms under turret all game.
Yea he died once but he allowed his enemy to snowball without getting anything back.
If you see your enemy in a different lane PUSH, pressure tower, do SOMETHING.

In my experience teammates will still flame you for not following certain death into the fog, even if you're pushing down the enemy turret. They just see you as mindlessly pushing. 

They also ignore pings too, which is nice.
happens too much to feel hypothetical {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

That's a fringe case.
Here's something much more common:

You are winning your lane against {{champion:91}}, then he heads down bot tripping over 2 Ghost Poros and 4 wards on the way, while you frantically spam Danger and Back Away pings and the bot lane still dies because they got 2v4'd due to pushing the entire time ignoring the minimap and pings.
Then Talon comes back to mid lane with a free {{item:3134}} and out-stats you on the spot while spamming Mastery emote after which your bot lane /all chats to report mid.

> [{quoted}](name=Sraeg2013,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=00010003,timestamp=2017-12-14T14:25:51.660+0000)
>
> That's a fringe case.
> Here's something much more common:
> 
> You are winning your lane against {{champion:91}}, then he heads down bot tripping over 2 Ghost Poros and 4 wards on the way, while you frantically spam Danger and Back Away pings and the bot lane still dies because they got 2v4'd due to pushing the entire time ignoring the minimap and pings.
> Then Talon comes back to mid lane with a free {{item:3134}} and out-stats you on the spot while spamming Mastery emote after which your bot lane /all chats to report mid.

As a Talon player, i can confirm this is accurate.
Sounds like you're blaming mid because you're bad.

No midlaner can follow a roaming talon anyway xD

That would be straight up intentionally feeding.

All you can do as the opposing mid is ping missing and pray to the heavens botlane responds in time.

Be {{champion:90}} enemy {{champion:91}} steps into brush *pings mia 5 times*,*looks bot they are fighting enemy bot lane*,*pings danger 5 more times*, starts walking bot seeing as there should be enough distance where if {{champion:91}} doubles back you should be able to run,*bot lane fighting and you have run out of pings at this point*, {{champion:91}}  ults and cleans up ur bot lane, bot lane spam pings mia on the empty mid lane, "wheres the pings mid??!!" , " Well you should have followed him" *in all chat* " gg shit bronzie mid laner im a silver god get me out this elo", *your team has started a surrender vote*

> [{quoted}](name=Iffy Jarl,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-12-14T09:03:36.485+0000)
>
> Be {{champion:90}} enemy {{champion:91}} steps into brush *pings mia 5 times*,*looks bot they are fighting enemy bot lane*,*pings danger 5 more times*, starts walking bot seeing as there should be enough distance where if {{champion:91}} doubles back you should be able to run,*bot lane fighting and you have run out of pings at this point*, {{champion:91}}  ults and cleans up ur bot lane, bot lane spam pings mia on the empty mid lane, "wheres the pings mid??!!" , " Well you should have followed him" *in all chat* " gg shit bronzie mid laner im a silver god get me out this elo", *your team has started a surrender vote*

so immersive i thought i was in a game

I refuse to believe ANYONE has ever uttered the phrase "I'm a silver god" unironically. And here I thought I was desperate to ask Rito to "double check" to make sure I wasn't supposed to skip any divisions on my one trick Graves jungle climb to gold because I was salty I only made it to silver 1 before the season ended.
Dude you can't write so realistically, i nearly felt the frustration and despair at my botlanes stupidity, and i am just casually browsing the net ._.

I was once accused of feeding (as support) from our midlaner and toplaner.

My side of the story:
>2/6/14 ~ {{champion:117}} 

>Our ADC:
8/1/2 ~ {{champion:21}} 

I was about to point something out, politely phrased, regarding my number of assists (which was being blatantly ignored in this) and what my job actually was, but something incredible happened! 

The ADC(!) told them to "STFU" (sic) on my behalf. 
_And we weren't even premade - it was just a random player._

...I cancelled my message as I really didn't see the need to say a word myself.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-12-14T10:34:29.506+0000)
>
> I was once accused of feeding from our midlaner and toplaner.
> 
> My side of the story:
> 8/1/2 ~ {{champion:21}} 
> 
> I was about to point something out politely phrased, but something incredible happened! The ADC(!) told them to STFU.
> 
> ...I cancelled my message and didn't see the need to say a word.

Ye that is so common in silver it's so sad. Support is not supposed to be judged on his own kills I often die to either save adc or feed my adc kills etc.

Exactly. And 4 of those deaths were when making "the ultimate sacrifice" to save the ADC, either by body blocking abilities or, when chased, just turn and run towards them as a distraction.

The other 2 were okay - I underestimated their damage output, and the last (or first, I still remember), we overstayed our welcome, and I had long since ran out of wards.
Holy...That's...a beautiful thing. That ADC was a wonderful person.
Your bot lane is going 10/7, most of those deaths were probably unavoidable to save the adc. Although in truth your still 6 deaths behind.

But the _individual_ number of deaths does translate into effective gold. I don't care about the exact rates (I am content with Gold V), but if I am worth 50 gold, even if I die some more (so long as it's not excessively), that hardly matters over the course of the game.

By comparison, the ADC would be worth, what? 450 gold? Or whatever the max is. So better me than the ADC.

When doing K/D ratings, please include the "A" for assists. They do count, contrary to popular belief.

" politely phrased"
 {{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Supp mains are very nice people until they otp blitz and thresh

######_Tell me about it..._

Which is why I'm not maining those. ^^
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/eune/37320309/PaladinNO#/champ-mastery
_By the way, I think the online meme is accurate: "MMORPG - Many Men Online Role Playing Girls".
In my case, Lulu, Nami, Kayle, Janna, Sona, Irelia, Syndra, Soraka, Sejuani etc.
It's a purple life, eh._

Also, as a Nami player, whenever the opportunity presents itself, I ban Thresh on general principle!
_I don't like getting hooked like a generic fish in a barrel._ :'(

http://danbooru.donmai.us/data/dd6109ebc850da0d95d32a3859f1206d.jpg

Had fun in the intense match that was my previous match on Summoner's Rift:
https://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1865706332/201309331?tab=overview

We struggled for a bit when the ADC's PC shut down (...or so he claimed, when he came back in the last few minutes), and some wanted to surrender for awhile, but we soldiered on, 4v5, and we won through in the end.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-12-14T10:34:29.506+0000)
>
> I was once accused of feeding (as support) from our midlaner and toplaner.
> 
> My side of the story:
> 8/1/2 ~ {{champion:21}} 
> 
> I was about to point something out, politely phrased, regarding my number of assists (which was being blatantly ignored in this) and what my job actually was, but something incredible happened! 
> 
> The ADC(!) told them to "STFU" (sic) on my behalf. 
> _And we weren't even premade - it was just a random player._
> 
> ...I cancelled my message as I really didn't see the need to say a word myself.

TFW your ADC actually cares and stands up for you!

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

Yeah, I had to do a triple-take on it - I couldn't believe the ADC of all roles would stand up for anyone else.
And best of all, when the ADC also got pepper for defending me, he/she didn't rise to the flame bait, but instead didn't say anything further.

I had decided not to post this previously, as it in this case would be an exaggerated cliche, but it really did feel similar:

http://pm1.narvii.com/6437/1606e5a4b3b468aa6ba3e5f1b978f165cca38a05_hq.jpg

I didn't find it proper to thank the person outright in the team chat, so it was a silent "thank you" from my heart.
And I decided then and there, that that ADC wouldn't die on my watch.

Unfortunately, I remember we lost the match in the end, as the jungler couldn't help with both of the 2 losing lanes - namely top and mid...

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cEggFXnF,comment-id=000600050000,timestamp=2017-12-15T21:59:52.918+0000)

Awww thats so sweet! Sorry about the loss tho. :/

At least we can sleep knowing there are some genuinely nice ADCs out there :)

GOD I hate that shhi man
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

_I've even been told I fed mid when I've died once... **once**_ 
 
.. "well that first kill really boosted him"  - The 2/6/2 <insert champion> .   >:(

I have been told that i feed mid when i was 22/1, becouse our adc couldn't 1v1 enemy mid laner. I was 30/1 at the end of the game..
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
death is the best cc they was mad cause you didnt keep them CCed{{sticker:sg-syndra}}

1-get rekt in 1 vs 1 against Top as adc
2-get enraged
3-look for suspects in your team
4-OPEN SCORE BOARD
5-Locate the highest death and lowest kills...Ignore assists  (uselss stat) 
6-Target Found.....Initiating
7-FUCKING LULU FED MID OMFG REPORT in all chat
8-Good job, now you succesfully averted the blame to your poor supp
"Report Jungler." Always the jungler, even if they gank. Feelsbadman {{sticker:sg-janna}}

Same :( 
Every time I play a mid like Orianna against an aggressive matchup I get blamed for if they get fed off my teammates. 

######also, this probably fits memes & games better######

You guys have it all wrong. It's more like this. You're playing {{champion:99}}. You die to {{champion:55}}, as you're dead, you see her walk over to the river bush. You assume she's roaming. You ping enemies are missing and your bot lane doesn't listen. They die to katarina and go "why didn't you follow your laner?" UMM idk maybe because I DIED.
death is the best cc
If you can help it, just give zero fucks, consider the game lost and tell them to go fuck themselves and git gud as they fucked up and not you as you most likely with have the score to prove it.
